0: Chuck Norris already went to Moon and Mars, that's why there are no signs of life.
1: Chuck Norris knows everything there is to know - Except for the definition of mercy.
2: China lets Chuck Norris search for porn on Google.
3: When Chuck Norris makes a burrito, its main ingredient is real toes.
4: Contrary to popular belief, there is indeed enough Chuck Norris to go around.
5: There is no April 1st in Chuck Norris' calendar, because no one can fool him.
6: Chuck Norris does not follow fashion trends, they follow him. But then he turns around and kicks their ass. Nobody follows Chuck Norris.
7: The Bible was originally titled "Chuck Norris and Friends"
9: Chuck Norris never has to build his program to machine code. Machines have learnt to interpret Chuck Norris code.
10: The crossing lights in Chuck Norris's home town say "Die slowly" and "die quickly". They each have a picture of Chuck Norris punching or kicking a pedestrian.
